content: Enlightening. Informative. Thank you. My “platform”, I guess, is Blogspot. I also have had some things published in “Medium”. “Virality” is the key, for sure. My brief experience is fraught with the curious, however. I am still unable to figure out how “Operation Catnip & Julie Newmar, Star” garnered nearly 600 “views” in a matter of hours. IN POLAND… Posted 25th January 2016 by DILULIUS, King of Troy or… How another blog received nearly 300 “views” in Russia in a day without acknowledgement of, which blog entry was, in fact viewed. I have neither particular Internet faculty nor natural inclination toward the electronic “arts”. I just produce a blog often based upon alternative views of current events. I’ll use your advise with an eye towards greater “virality”. I’ll take this opportunity to ‘ask for a share’. Thanks again.
